resources.string: Create A Task To Be Done
Notifies you when you receive a message
Enter a name for your Bubble
Add a friend to your Bubble

Thank you for using the app Babbling Bubble!!

This app was a joint effort by the Kulkarni Family. Vedant Kulkarni wrote the code for the app. Siddhant Kulkarni and Rahul Kulkarni gave design inputs and without them, the wonderful UX that the app has would not have been pssible. Madhura Kulkarni gave end-user inputs and helped add features that would appeal to the user.

The icons here were taken from "The Noun Project" on www.thenounproject.com and "Flaticon" on www.flaticon.com
Colours were chosen using the help of the "Material Design - Colour Picker" on www.material.io/tools/color/
Choose to add it as a todo or send it as a message -
Choose the group to send it to
